trans-unit.source: Signal handlers are a special sort of method attribute, where the method implementation is invoked by the QML engine whenever the associated signal is emitted. Adding a signal to an object definition in QML will automatically add an associated signal handler to the object definition, which has, by default, an empty implementation. Clients can provide an implementation, to implement program logic.
trans-unit.target: 信号处理程序是一种特殊的方法属性，只要发出关联的信号，QML引擎就会调用该方法的实现。在QML中向对象定义添加信号会自动向该对象定义添加关联的信号处理程序，该信号处理程序默认情况下为空实现。客户可以提供一种实现，以实现程序逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Signal handlers are a special sort of method attribute, where the method implementation is invoked by the QML engine whenever the associated signal is emitted. Adding a signal to an object definition in QML will automatically add an associated signal handler to the object definition, which has, by default, an empty implementation. Clients can provide an implementation, to implement program logic.

trans-unit.source: Signal objects have a connect() method to a connect a signal either to a method or another signal. When a signal is connected to a method, the method is automatically invoked whenever the signal is emitted. This mechanism enables a signal to be received by a method instead of a signal handler.

trans-unit.source: Signals and slots are used for communication between objects. The signals and slots mechanism is a central feature of Qt and probably the part that differs most from the features provided by other frameworks.

trans-unit.source: Signals and slots are used for communication between objects. The signals and slots mechanism is a central feature of Qt and probably the part that differs most from the features provided by other frameworks. Signals and slots are made possible by Qt's meta-object system.

Signals and slots are used for communication between objects. The signals and slots mechanism is a central feature of Qt and probably the part that differs most from the features provided by other frameworks. Signals and slots are made possible by Qt's meta-object system.
trans-unit.target: 信号和插槽用于对象之间的通信。信号和时隙机制是Qt的主要功能，可能是与其他框架提供的功能最大不同的部分。Qt的元对象系统使信号和时隙成为可能。

trans-unit.source: Signals and slots can have return types, but signals or slots returning references will be treated as returning void.

trans-unit.target: 信号和槽,属性和子代。

trans-unit.source: Signals are automatically generated by the moc and must not be implemented in the .cpp file. They can never have return types (i.e. use void).
trans-unit.target: 信号是由Moc自动生成的，不得在 .cpp 文件中实现。他们永远不能有返回类型（即使用 void ）。

trans-unit.source: Signals are emitted by an object when its internal state has changed in some way that might be interesting to the object's client or owner. Signals are public access functions and can be emitted from anywhere, but we recommend to only emit them from the class that defines the signal and its subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 当一个对象的内部状态以某种方式发生变化时,信号就会被对象的客户端或所有者发出。信号是公共访问函数,可以从任何地方发出,但我们建议只从定义信号的类及其子类中发出。

trans-unit.source: Signals are not blocked by default.

trans-unit.source: Signals emitted while being blocked are not buffered.

Similar to Texture Aliasing, a material reflecting the environment will sub-sample the image. In some cases, as seen on the left in the image below, it becomes obvious when fine details are being skipped.
Similar to Indexed, pixel values represent a list of available gray tones. QColormap uses the index of the gray tone that most closely matches the computed gray tone of an RGB value.
Similar to Indexed, pixel values represent a vector of available gray tones. QColormap uses the index of the gray tone that most closely matches the computed gray tone of an RGB value.
trans-unit.target: 与 Indexed 相似，像素值表示可用灰色调的向量。QColormap使用最接近匹配所计算的RGB值的灰度的灰度索引。

trans-unit.source: Similar to RenderDirectToBackground mode, except that the graph will not clear the whole window before rendering the graph. This mode is better for windows where you have other custom items besides the graphs that also draw on the window background. In that case you need to either take care of the window clearing yourself or ensure that all areas of the window are fully covered with opaque items. If one graph in the window uses either of the direct rendering modes, then all other graphs in the same window also drawn in direct modes should use the exact same direct rendering mode. Otherwise some graphs may not show up, depending on the drawing order of the graphs.
trans-unit.target: 与 RenderDirectToBackground 模式类似，不同之处在于在渲染图形之前图形不会清除整个窗口。对于在窗口上还绘制其他图形的窗口中，您还有其他自定义项目的窗口，此模式更好。在这种情况下，您需要清理自己的窗户或确保窗户的所有区域都被不透明的物品完全覆盖。如果窗口中的一个图形使用任何一种直接渲染模式，则同一窗口中也以直接模式绘制的所有其他图形应使用完全相同的直接渲染模式。否则，某些图形可能不会显示，具体取决于图形的绘制顺序。

trans-unit.source: Similar to classesbymodule argument, but used for listing the JavaScript types from the module specified with the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 classesbymodule 参数，但用于列出使用第二个参数指定的模块中的JavaScript类型。

trans-unit.source: Similar to classesbymodule argument, but used for listing the QML types from the QML module specified with the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 classesbymodule 参数，但用于列出使用第二个参数指定的QML模块中的QML类型。

trans-unit.source: Similar to CompositionMode_Difference, but with a lower contrast. Painting with white inverts the destination color, whereas painting with black leaves the destination color unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 类似于CompositionMode_Difference,但对比度较低。用白色涂抹会反转目标色,而用黑色涂抹则不会改变目标色。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Decimal, but the exponent is a power of 2 instead.
trans-unit.target: 类似于十进制,但指数是2的幂。

trans-unit.source: Similar to PartialUpdateBlit, but instead of using framebuffer blits, the contents of the extra framebuffer is rendered by drawing a textured quad with blending enabled. This, unlike PartialUpdateBlit, allows alpha blended content and works even when the glBlitFramebuffer is not available. Performance-wise this setting is likely to be somewhat slower than PartialUpdateBlit.
trans-unit.target: 类似于PartialUpdateBlit,但不是使用帧缓冲区blits,而是通过绘制一个启用了混合的纹理四边形来渲染额外帧缓冲区的内容。与PartialUpdateBlit不同的是,这允许alpha混合内容,并且即使在glBlitFramebuffer不可用时也能工作。从性能上来说,这个设置可能会比PartialUpdateBlit慢一些。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Repeat, but scales the image down to ensure that the last tile is not cropped.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 "重复",但缩小图像的比例,以确保最后一块瓷砖不被裁剪。

trans-unit.source: Similar to items in Qt Quick, Popup's x and y coordinates are relative to its parent. This means that opening a popup that is a child of a Button, for example, will cause the popup to be positioned relative to the button.
trans-unit.target: 与Qt Quick中的项目类似，Popup的x和y坐标是相对于其父级的。这意味着，例如，打开作为Button子级的弹出窗口，将导致该弹出窗口相对于Button定位。

trans-unit.source: Similar to l{Texture Aliasing}, a material reflecting the environment will sub-sample the image. In some cases, as seen on the left in the image below, becomes obvious when fine details are being skipped.
Similar to the qwindows plugin, but replaces the raster paint engine with a Direct2D-based paint engine for QPixmap and QBackingStore.
trans-unit.target: 与 qwindows 插件类似，但是将QPixmap和QBackingStore的光栅绘制引擎替换为基于Direct2D的绘制引擎。

trans-unit.source: Similarly to QOpenGLContext, any actual Vulkan instance creation happens only when calling create(). This allows using QVulkanInstance as a plain member variable while retaining control over when to perform initialization.

Similarly to QModelIndexList, QItemSelection is exposed in QML as a JavaScript array of QItemSelectionRange objects. Conversions are automatically made from and to C++. In fact, any JavaScript array can be converted back to QItemSelection, with non-QItemSelectionRange objects replaced by empty QItemSelectionRanges.

Similarly to QMouseEvent, Qt automatically grabs each touch point on the first press inside a widget, and the widget will receive all updates for the touch point until it is released. Note that it is possible for a widget to receive events for numerous touch points, and that multiple widgets may be receiving touch events at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 与QMouseEvent相似，Qt会在窗口小部件内的第一次按下时自动捕获每个触摸点，并且该窗口小部件将接收到该触摸点的所有更新，直到其被释放。请注意，窗口小部件可能会接收多个触摸点的事件，并且多个窗口小部件可能会同时接收触摸事件。

trans-unit.source: Similarly to QOpenGLContext, any actual Vulkan instance creation happens only when calling create(). This allows using QVulkanInstance as a plain member variable while retaining control over when to perform initialization.
trans-unit.target: 与QOpenGLContext相似，任何实际的Vulkan实例创建都仅在调用create（）时发生。这允许将QVulkanInstance用作普通成员变量，同时保留对何时执行初始化的控制。

trans-unit.source: Similarly to QOpenGLContext, any actual Vulkan instance creation happens only when calling create(). This allows using QVulkanInstance as a plain member variable while retaining control over when to perform initialization.

Similarly to QOpenGLWidget, QOpenGLWindow supports the Qt::AA_ShareOpenGLContexts attribute. When enabled, the OpenGL contexts of all QOpenGLWindow instances will share with each other. This allows accessing each other's shareable OpenGL resources.
trans-unit.target: 与QOpenGLWidget相似，QOpenGLWindow支持Qt :: AA_ShareOpenGLContexts属性。启用后，所有QOpenGLWindow实例的OpenGL上下文将彼此共享。这允许访问彼此的共享OpenGL资源。

trans-unit.source: Similarly to QOpenGLWidget, QOpenGLWindow supports the Qt::AA_ShareOpenGLContexts attribute. When enabled, the OpenGL contexts of all QOpenGLWindow instances will share with each other. This allows accessing each other's shareable OpenGL resources.

Similarly to QVulkanInstance, device extensions can be queried via supportedDeviceExtensions() before the actual initialization. Requesting an extension to be enabled is done via setDeviceExtensions(). Such calls must be made before the window becomes visible, that is, before calling show() or similar functions. Unsupported extension requests are gracefully ignored.
trans-unit.target: 与QVulkanInstance相似，可以在实际初始化之前通过supportedDeviceExtensions（）查询设备扩展。通过setDeviceExtensions（）请求启用扩展。必须在窗口可见之前（即，在调用show（）或类似函数之前）进行此类调用。不受支持的扩展请求将被正常忽略。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, an invisible item cannot have focus, so if the item has focus when it becomes invisible, it will lose focus, and the focus is not regained by simply making the item visible again.
trans-unit.target: 同理,一个不可见的物品不可能有焦点,所以如果物品在变成不可见的时候有焦点,就会失去焦点,而焦点并不是简单地让物品再次可见就能恢复的。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, elements which are invisible (for example, the second tab in a tab widget, while the first tab is shown) but need to be initialized at startup time (for example, if the cost of instantiating the second tab takes too long to be able to do it only when the tab is activated), should have their "visible" property set to false, in order to avoid the cost of drawing them (although as previously explained, they will still incur the cost of any animations or bindings evaluation since they are still active).
trans-unit.target: 同样，不可见的元素（例如，标签小部件中的第二个标签，而第一个标签则显示），但需要在启动时进行初始化（例如，实例化第二个标签的成本过长而无法只能在激活选项卡时才能执行此操作），应将其“ visible”属性设置为 false ，以避免绘制它们的成本（尽管如前所述，它们仍然会产生任何动画或绑定评估的成本因为它们仍然处于活动状态）。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if UseFloat16 is specified, this function will try to use half-precision (qfloat16) floating point if the conversion to that results in no loss of precision. This is always true for infinities and NaN.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果指定UseFloat16，则该函数将尝试使用半精度（ qfloat16 ）浮点，如果对该点的转换不会导致精度损失。对于无穷大和NaN总是如此。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if UseFloat16 is specified, this function will try to use half-precision (binary16) floating point if the conversion to that results in no loss of precision. This is always true for infinities and NaN.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果指定了UseFloat16，则该函数将尝试使用半精度（binary16）浮点数，如果对该点的转换不会导致精度损失。对于无穷大和NaN总是如此。

Similarly, if a C++ type uses a QDateTime for a property type or method parameter, the value can be created as a JavaScript Date object in QML, and is automatically converted to a QDateTime value when it is passed to C++.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果C ++类型将QDateTime用作属性类型或方法参数，则可以将该值创建为QML中的JavaScript Date 对象，并在将其传递给C ++时自动转换为QDateTime值。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if a C++ type uses a QVariantList or QVariantMap type for a property type or method parameter, the value can be created as a JavaScript array or object in QML, and is automatically converted to a QVariantList or QVariantMap when it is passed to C++.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果C ++类型对属性类型或方法参数使用QVariantList或QVariantMap类型，则可以将其创建为QML中的JavaScript数组或对象，并在将其传递给C ++时自动将其转换为QVariantList或QVariantMap。

Similarly, the EGLFS platform plugin has multiple backends. The default is chosen based on availability and a pre-defined priority order. If drm and gbm are available, the default will be the eglfs_kms backend. This can always be overridden at runtime by setting the QT_QPA_EGLFS_INTEGRATION environment variable.

Similarly, the HSL saturation value is not in general the same as the HSV saturation value for the same color. hslSaturation() provides the color's HSL saturation value, while saturation() and hsvSaturation() provides the HSV saturation value.
trans-unit.target: 类似地，对于相同的颜色，HSL饱和度值通常与HSV饱和度值不同。hslSaturation（）提供颜色的HSL饱和度值，而饱和度（）和hsvSaturation（）提供HSV饱和度值。

trans-unit.source: Simple models can be created by subclassing this class and implementing the minimum number of required functions. For example, we could implement a simple read-only QStringList-based model that provides a list of strings to a QListView widget. In such a case, we only need to implement the rowCount() function to return the number of items in the list, and the data() function to retrieve items from the list.
trans-unit.target: 通过子类化此类并实现所需功能的最少数量，可以创建简单的模型。例如，我们可以实现一个简单的基于QStringList的只读模型，该模型为QListView小部件提供字符串列表。在这种情况下，我们只需要实现rowCount（）函数以返回列表中的项目数，而只需实现data（）函数以从列表中检索项目。

trans-unit.source: Simple radial gradients interpolate colors between a focal point and end points on a circle surrounding it. Extended radial gradients interpolate colors between a focal circle and a center circle. Points outside the cone defined by the two circles will be transparent. For simple radial gradients the focal point is adjusted to lie inside the center circle, whereas the focal point can have any position in an extended radial gradient.

Since QAbstractProxyModel and its subclasses are derived from QAbstractItemModel, much of the same advice about subclassing normal models also applies to proxy models. In addition, it is worth noting that many of the default implementations of functions in this class are written so that they call the equivalent functions in the relevant source model. This simple proxying mechanism may need to be overridden for source models with more complex behavior; for example, if the source model provides a custom hasChildren() implementation, you should also provide one in the proxy model.
trans-unit.target: 由于QAbstractProxyModel及其子类是从QAbstractItemModel派生的，因此有关对普通模型进行子类化的许多建议也适用于代理模型。另外，值得注意的是，编写了此类的许多默认函数实现，以便它们在相关源模型中调用等效函数。对于行为更复杂的源模型，可能需要重写这种简单的代理机制。例如，如果源模型提供了自定义的hasChildren（）实现，则还应该在代理模型中提供一个。

trans-unit.source: Since QAnimationGroup inherits from QAbstractAnimation, you can combine groups, and easily construct complex animation graphs. You can query QAbstractAnimation for the group it belongs to (using the group() function).
trans-unit.target: 由于QAnimationGroup继承自QAbstractAnimation，因此您可以组合组，并轻松构造复杂的动画图。您可以查询QAbstractAnimation所属的组（使用group（）函数）。

trans-unit.source: Since QByteArray is not a QIODevice subclass, internally a QBuffer is created to wrap the byte array.
trans-unit.target: 由于QByteArray不是QIODevice子类，因此在内部创建QBuffer来包装字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Since QCommonStyle inherits QStyle, all of its functions are fully documented in the QStyle documentation.
trans-unit.target: 由于QCommonStyle继承了QStyle，因此其所有功能都在QStyle文档中进行了充分记录。

trans-unit.source: Since QDial inherits from QAbstractSlider, the dial behaves in a similar way to a slider. When wrapping() is false (the default setting) there is no real difference between a slider and a dial. They both share the same signals, slots and member functions. Which one you use depends on the expectations of your users and on the type of application.
trans-unit.target: 由于QDial继承自QAbstractSlider，因此刻度盘的行为与滑块类似。当wrap（）为假（默认设置）时，滑块和拨盘之间没有真正的区别。它们都共享相同的信号，插槽和成员功能。您使用哪一种取决于用户的期望和应用程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: Since restorePurchases() may, on some platforms, cause the user to be prompted for their password, it should usually be called as a reaction to user input. For instance applications can have a button in the UI which will trigger restorePurchases() and which users can hit manually if they have reinstalled the application (or installed it on a new device) and need to unlock the features that they have previously paid for.
trans-unit.target: 由于restorePurchases（）在某些平台上可能会导致提示用户输入密码，因此通常应将其称为对用户输入的反应。例如，应用程序可以在UI中具有一个按钮，该按钮将触发restorePurchases（），并且如果用户已经重新安装了该应用程序（或将其安装在新设备上）并且需要解锁他们以前付费的功能，则这些用户可以手动命中。

trans-unit.source: Since QString uses the Unicode encoding internally, every language in the world can be processed transparently using familiar text processing operations. Also, since all Qt functions that present text to the user take a QString as a parameter, there is no char * to QString conversion overhead.
trans-unit.target: 由于QString在内部使用Unicode编码，因此可以使用熟悉的文本处理操作透明地处理世界上的每种语言。同样，由于所有向用户显示文本的Qt函数都将QString作为参数，因此没有 char * 到QString的转换开销。

trans-unit.source: Since QSvgWidget is a subclass of QWidget, SVG drawings are rendered using the properties of the display. More control can be exercised over the rendering process with the QSvgRenderer class, as this can be used to paint onto other paint devices, such as QImage and QGLWidget. The renderer used by the widget can be obtained with the renderer() function.
trans-unit.target: 由于QSvgWidget是QWidget的子类，因此将使用显示的属性来渲染SVG绘图。使用QSvgRenderer类可以对呈现过程进行更多控制，因为它可以用于在其他绘制设备（例如QImage和QGLWidget）上进行绘制。小部件使用的渲染器可以通过renderer（）函数获得。

trans-unit.source: Since QTcpSocket inherits QIODevice, you can use it with QTextStream and QDataStream. When reading from a QTcpSocket, you must make sure that enough data is available by calling QTcpSocket::bytesAvailable() beforehand.

Since QDoc version 5.12, \code command accepts also optional parameters. Parameters are useful for injecting simple strings into the code snippet. To inject a string to a specific location in the snippet, add a backslash followed by a digit (1..8). The digits correspond with the order of the argument list, where arguments are separated by spaces.
trans-unit.target: 从QDoc 5.12版本开始,code命令也接受可选的参数。参数对于在代码片段中注入简单的字符串非常有用。要在代码段中的特定位置注入一个字符串,请在后面添加一个反斜杠和一个数字(1...8)。数字与参数列表的顺序相对应,其中参数用空格分隔。

Since QSvgWidget is a subclass of QWidget, SVG drawings are rendered using the properties of the display. More control can be exercised over the rendering process with the QSvgRenderer class, as this can be used to paint onto other paint devices, such as QImage and QGLWidget. The renderer used by the widget can be obtained with the renderer() function.

Since QWidget is a subclass of QPaintDevice, subclasses can be used to display custom content that is composed using a series of painting operations with an instance of the QPainter class. This approach contrasts with the canvas-style approach used by the Graphics View Framework where items are added to a scene by the application and are rendered by the framework itself.

Since Qt 4.1, the Qt::WA_ContentsPropagated widget attribute has been deprecated. Instead, the contents of parent widgets are propagated by default to each of their children as long as Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen is not set. Custom widgets can be written to take advantage of this feature by updating irregular regions (to create non-rectangular child widgets), or painting with colors that have less than full alpha component. The following diagram shows how attributes and properties of a custom widget can be fine-tuned to achieve different effects.

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.4, there are two delegate classes: QItemDelegate and QStyledItemDelegate. However, the default delegate is QStyledItemDelegate. These two classes are independent alternatives to painting and providing editors for items in views. The difference between them is that QStyledItemDelegate uses the current style to paint its items. We therefore recommend using QStyledItemDelegate as the base class when implementing custom delegates or when working with Qt style sheets. The code required for either class should be equal unless the custom delegate needs to use the style for drawing.
trans-unit.target: 从Qt 4.4开始，有两个委托类：QItemDelegate和QStyledItemDelegate。但是，默认委托是QStyledItemDelegate。这两类是绘画的独立选择，并为视图中的项目提供编辑器。它们之间的区别在于QStyledItemDelegate使用当前样式来绘制其项目。因此，在实现自定义委托或使用Qt样式表时，建议将QStyledItemDelegate用作基类。除非自定义委托需要使用绘制样式，否则两个类所需的代码应相等。

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 4.4, there are two delegate classes: QItemDelegate and QStyledItemDelegate. However, the default delegate is QStyledItemDelegate. These two classes are independent alternatives to painting and providing editors for items in views. The difference between them is that QStyledItemDelegate uses the current style to paint its items. We therefore recommend using QStyledItemDelegate as the base class when implementing custom delegates or when working with Qt style sheets. The code required for either class should be equal unless the custom delegate needs to use the style for drawing.

Since Qt 4.4, there are two delegate classes: QItemDelegate and QStyledItemDelegate. However, the default delegate is QStyledItemDelegate. These two classes are independent alternatives to painting and providing editors for items in views. The difference between them is that QStyledItemDelegate uses the current style to paint its items. We therefore recommend using QStyledItemDelegate as the base class when implementing custom delegates or when working with Qt style sheets. The code required for either class should be equal unless the custom delegate needs to use the style for drawing.

trans-unit.source: Since Qt 5.12, vertical and horizontal linear gradients can be applied to items. If you need to apply angled gradients, a combination of rotation and clipping can be applied to the relevant items. Alternatively, consider using QtQuick.Shapes::LinearGradient or QtGraphicalEffects::LinearGradient. These approaches can all introduce additional performance requirements for your application.

It is strongly recommended to call update() on the widget's top-level window after enabling or disabling this attribute.

Since Qt Multimedia for iOS uses the camera, the Info.plist assigned to QMAKE_INFO_PLIST in the project file must contain the key NSCameraUsageDescription. Otherwise the application will abort on startup. See Info.plist documentation from Apple for more information regarding this key.

trans-unit.source: Since QtRO is a peer-to-peer network, to acquire() a valid Replica, the replica's node needs to be connected to the node that hosts its Source. A host node is a node that allows other nodes to connect to it, which is accomplished by giving hosts unique addresses. This address is provided to the QRemoteObjectHost constructor or set by the setHostUrl method. The node from which a replica is requested must establish the connection to the host node, to initialize the replica and keep it up to date.

trans-unit.source: Since all methods are considered to be in revision 0 if untagged, a tag of Q_REVISION(0) or Q_REVISION(0, 0) is invalid and ignored.

trans-unit.source: Since dock widgets are container widgets, they can be added to a form in the usual way. Once added to a form, dock widgets are not placed in any particular dock area by default; you need to set the docked property to true for each widget and choose an appropriate value for its dockWidgetArea property.

Since dock widgets are container widgets, they can be added to a form in the usual way. Once added to a form, dock widgets are not placed in any particular dock area by default; you need to set the docked property to true for each widget and choose an appropriate value for its dockWidgetArea property.

trans-unit.source: Since each view transition is run once for each item affected by the transition, the ViewTransition properties can be used within a transition to define custom behavior for each item's transition. For example, the ListView in the previous example could use this information to create a ripple-type effect on the movement of the displaced items.
trans-unit.target: 由于每个视图过渡对于受过渡影响的每个项目都运行一次，因此可以在过渡内使用ViewTransition属性为每个项目的过渡定义自定义行为。例如，上一个示例中的ListView可以使用此信息在被移动的物品的移动上创建波纹类型的效果。

trans-unit.source: Since each view transition is run once for each item affected by the transition, the ViewTransition properties can be used within a transition to define custom behavior for each item's transition. For example, the ListView in the previous example could use this information to create a ripple-type effect on the movement of the displaced items.

Since elements, text nodes, comments, processing instructions, etc., cannot exist outside the context of a document, the document class also contains the factory functions needed to create these objects. The node objects created have an ownerDocument() function which associates them with the document within whose context they were created. The DOM classes that will be used most often are QDomNode, QDomDocument, QDomElement and QDomText.
trans-unit.target: 由于元素，文本节点，注释，处理指令等不能在文档上下文之外存在，因此文档类还包含创建这些对象所需的工厂功能。创建的节点对象具有ownerDocument（）函数，该函数将它们与在其上下文中创建的文档相关联。最常使用的DOM类是QDomNode，QDomDocument，QDomElement和QDomText。

trans-unit.source: Since elements, text nodes, comments, processing instructions, etc., cannot exist outside the context of a document, the document class also contains the factory functions needed to create these objects. The node objects created have an ownerDocument() function which associates them with the document within whose context they were created. The DOM classes that will be used most often are QDomNode, QDomDocument, QDomElement and QDomText.

Since foreach creates a copy of the container, using a non-const reference for the variable does not allow you to modify the original container. It only affects the copy, which is probably not what you want.
trans-unit.target: 因为foreach创建了一个容器的副本,所以对变量使用非const引用不允许你修改原始容器。它只会影响副本,这可能不是你想要的。

trans-unit.source: Since height maps do not contain values for X or Z axes, those values need to be given separately using minXValue, maxXValue, minZValue, and maxZValue properties. X-value corresponds to image horizontal direction and Z-value to the vertical. Setting any of these properties triggers asynchronous re-resolving of any existing height map.
trans-unit.target: 由于高度图不包含X轴或Z轴的值，因此需要使用minXValue，maxXValue，minZValue和maxZValue属性分别给出这些值。X值对应于图像水平方向，Z值对应于垂直方向。设置任何这些属性都会触发异步重新解析任何现有的高度图。

trans-unit.source: Since height maps do not contain values for X or Z axes, those values need to be given separately using minXValue, maxXValue, minZValue, and maxZValue properties. trans-unit.target: 由于高度图不包含X轴或Z轴的值，因此需要使用minXValue，maxXValue，minZValue和maxZValue属性分别给出这些值。X值对应于图像水平方向，Z值对应于垂直方向。设置任何这些属性都会触发异步重新解析任何现有的高度图。

trans-unit.source: Since sensor backends are created on demand, the sensor plugin is loaded and asked to register the sensor backends it handles. The plugin should implement QSensorPluginInterface::registerSensors() and call QSensorManager::registerBackend() to register available backends. Typically the plugin will also inherit from QSensorBackendFactory and implement QSensorBackendFactory::createBackend() in order to instantiate backends it has registered.
trans-unit.target: 由于传感器后端是按需创建的，因此会加载传感器插件，并要求注册其处理的传感器后端。该插件应实现QSensorPluginInterface :: registerSensors（）并调用QSensorManager :: registerBackend（）来注册可用的后端。通常，该插件还将继承自QSensorBackendFactory并实现QSensorBackendFactory :: createBackend（）以便实例化已注册的后端。

trans-unit.source: Since sharing data over NFC is effectively a data pipe between two processes (one on the sender and one of the receiver), the application developer should only create a single instance of QNearFieldShareManager per application. This avoids the possibility that different parts of the same application attempt to all consume data transferred over NFC.
trans-unit.target: 由于通过NFC共享数据实际上是两个进程之间的数据管道（一个在发送者上，一个在接收者上），因此应用程序开发人员应仅为每个应用程序创建一个QNearFieldShareManager实例。这避免了同一应用程序的不同部分尝试全部消耗通过NFC传输的数据的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Since sharing data over NFC is effectively a data pipe between two processes (one on the sender and one of the receiver), the application developer should only create a single instance of QNearFieldShareManager per application. This avoids the possibility that different parts of the same application attempt to all consume data transferred over NFC.

Since slots are normal member functions, they follow the normal C++ rules when called directly. However, as slots, they can be invoked by any component, regardless of its access level, via a signal-slot connection. This means that a signal emitted from an instance of an arbitrary class can cause a private slot to be invoked in an instance of an unrelated class.
trans-unit.target: 由于槽是正常的成员函数,所以当直接调用时,它们遵循正常的C++规则。然而,作为槽,它们可以被任何组件调用,不管它的访问级别如何,通过信号-槽连接。这意味着,一个任意类的实例发出的信号可以导致一个私有槽在一个不相关的类的实例中被调用。

trans-unit.source: Since the WorkerScript.onMessage() function is run in a separate thread, the JavaScript file is evaluated in a context separate from the main QML engine. Since the handler classes only describe interfaces you must implement all the functions. We provide the QXmlDefaultHandler class to make this easier: it implements a default behavior (do nothing) for all functions, so you can subclass it and just implement the functions you are interested in.
trans-unit.target: 由于处理程序类仅描述接口，因此必须实现所有功能。我们提供了QXmlDefaultHandler类来简化此过程：它为所有函数实现了默认行为（不执行任何操作），因此您可以将其子类化，而仅实现您感兴趣的函数。

trans-unit.source: Since the model is non-hierarchical, we can safely ignore the model index corresponding to the parent item. By default, models derived from QAbstractListModel only contain one column, so we do not need to reimplement the columnCount() function.
trans-unit.target: 由于模型是非分层的，因此我们可以安全地忽略与父项相对应的模型索引。默认情况下，从QAbstractListModel派生的模型仅包含一列，因此我们无需重新实现columnCount（）函数。

trans-unit.source: Since the model provides a more specialized interface than QAbstractItemModel, it is not suitable for use with tree views, although it can be used to provide data to a QListView. If you need to represent a simple list of items, and only need a model to contain a single column of data, subclassing the QAbstractListModel may be more appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 由于该模型提供的接口比QAbstractItemModel更为专用，因此尽管可用于向QListView提供数据，但它不适用于树视图。如果您需要表示一个简单的项目列表，并且只需要一个模型来包含单个数据列，则对QAbstractListModel进行子类化可能更合适。

trans-unit.source: Since the model provides a more specialized interface than QAbstractItemModel, it is not suitable for use with tree views; you will need to subclass QAbstractItemModel if you want to provide a model for that purpose. If you need to use a number of list models to manage data, it may be more appropriate to subclass QAbstractTableModel instead.
trans-unit.target: 由于该模型提供的接口比QAbstractItemModel更专业，因此不适合与树视图一起使用。如果要为此目的提供模型，则需要子类QAbstractItemModel。如果您需要使用许多列表模型来管理数据，则更合适的是将QAbstractTableModel子类化。

trans-unit.source: Since the model represents a one-dimensional structure, the rowCount() function returns the total number of items in the model. The columnCount() function is implemented for interoperability with all kinds of views, but by default informs views that the model contains only one column.
trans-unit.target: 由于模型表示一维结构，因此rowCount（）函数返回模型中的项目总数。该信息columnCount（）函数用于各种意见的互操作性实现，但默认情况下INFORMS的观点，该模型只包含一列。

trans-unit.source: Since the release and debug libraries are inside the framework, the app is simply linked against the framework. Then when you run in the debugger, you will get either the release version or the debug version, depending on whether you set DYLD_IMAGE_SUFFIX. If you don't set it, you get the release version by default (i.e., non _debug). If you set DYLD_IMAGE_SUFFIX=_debug, you get the debug version.
trans-unit.target: 由于发布和调试库位于框架内部，因此仅将应用程序链接到框架即可。然后，当您在调试器中运行时，将根据您是否设置 DYLD_IMAGE_SUFFIX 获得发行版或调试版。如果未设置，则默认情况下会获得发行版本（即，非_debug）。如果设置 DYLD_IMAGE_SUFFIX=_debug ，则会获得调试版本。

trans-unit.source: Since the rotation of the reading values is based on the screen orientation, Z values will never change, as the Z axis is perpendicular to the screen. As screen orientation changes in 90 degree steps, rotating the reading values is also done in steps of 90 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 由于读数值的旋转是基于屏幕方向,Z值永远不会改变,因为Z轴垂直于屏幕。由于屏幕方向以90度为单位变化,旋转读数值也以90度为单位。

trans-unit.source: Since the sequence is modified in place, QtConcurrent::filter() does not return any results via QFuture. However, you can still use QFuture and QFutureWatcher to monitor the status of the filter.

trans-unit.source: Since the text stream uses a buffer, you should not read from the stream using the implementation of a superclass. For instance, if you have a QFile and read from it directly using QFile::readLine() instead of using the stream, the text stream's internal position will be out of sync with the file's position.
trans-unit.target: 由于文本流使用缓冲区，因此不应使用超类的实现来读取流。例如，如果您有一个QFile并使用QFile :: readLine（）而不是使用流直接读取它，则文本流的内部位置将与文件位置不同步。

trans-unit.source: Since the tool is run at build-time it has limited ability to reason about which properties might change at run-time. Properties where a value is only changing within the properties range, for example the roughness value, will not have any affect on the generated material shader, but properties that are either on or off, e.g., setting an image map at run-time, would require a different type of material to be generated. It is therefore recommended that all variants of a material, which enables or disables features in the material, or the scene, are declared as individual components, this will help the tool to generated the correct material shaders.

Since the value is changed directly, this bypasses Qt's meta-object system and the QML engine is not made aware of the property change. This means property bindings to buttonText would not be updated, and any onButtonTextChanged handlers would not be called.
trans-unit.target: 由于值是直接更改的，因此绕过了Qt的元对象系统，并且QML引擎没有意识到属性的更改。这意味着不会更新对 buttonText 的属性绑定，并且不会调用任何 onButtonTextChanged 处理程序。

Since there is no standard way to copy and paste files between applications on X11, various MIME types and conventions are currently in use. For instance, Nautilus expects files to be supplied with a x-special/gnome-copied-files MIME type with data beginning with the cut/copy action, a newline character, and the URL of the file.
trans-unit.target: 由于没有在X11上的应用程序之间复制和粘贴文件的标准方法，因此当前正在使用各种MIME类型和约定。例如，Nautilus期望为文件提供 x-special/gnome-copied-files MIME类型，其数据以剪切/复制操作，换行符和文件的URL开头。

trans-unit.source: Slots are implemented by the application programmer. Here is a possible implementation of the Counter::setValue() slot:
trans-unit.target: 插槽由应用程序程序员实现。这是 Counter::setValue() 插槽的可能实现：

trans-unit.source: Slots can be of three kinds:
trans-unit.target: 老虎机可以分为三种。

trans-unit.source: Slots can be used for receiving signals, but they are also normal member functions. Just as an object does not know if anything receives its signals, a slot does not know if it has any signals connected to it. This ensures that truly independent components can be created with Qt.
trans-unit.target: 槽可以用来接收信号,但它们也是正常的成员函数。就像一个对象不知道是否有任何东西接收它的信号一样,一个槽不知道是否有任何信号连接到它。这就保证了用Qt可以创建真正独立的组件。

trans-unit.source: Slots can have one parameter of type const QDBusMessage &, which must appear at the end of the input parameter list, before any output parameters. This parameter, if present, will be initialized with a copy of the current message being processed, which allows the callee to obtain information about the caller, such as its connection name.
trans-unit.target: 插槽可以具有一个类型为 const QDBusMessage & 参数，该参数必须出现在输入参数列表的末尾，在任何输出参数之前。如果存在此参数，将使用正在处理的当前消息的副本进行初始化，这将允许被调用方获取有关调用方的信息，例如其连接名称。

trans-unit.source: Slots in D-Bus adaptors are declared just like normal, public slots, but their parameters must follow certain rules (see The Qt D-Bus Type System for more information). Slots whose parameters do not follow those rules or that are not public will not be accessible via D-Bus.

Slots in D-Bus adaptors are declared just like normal, public slots, but their parameters must follow certain rules (see The Qt D-Bus Type System for more information). Slots whose parameters do not follow those rules or that are not public will not be accessible via D-Bus.
trans-unit.target: D-Bus适配器中的插槽与普通的公共插槽一样被声明，但是它们的参数必须遵循某些规则（有关更多信息，请参见Qt D-Bus类型系统）。参数不符合这些规则或不公开的插槽将无法通过D-Bus访问。

trans-unit.source: Some RPM versions have problems installing some of the Qt RPM archives where installation stops with an error message warning about a Failed Dependency. Use the --nodeps option of rpm as workaround this problem.
trans-unit.target: 某些RPM版本在安装某些Qt RPM归档文件时遇到问题，在这些文件中，安装将停止并显示一条错误消息，提示有关依赖项失败的信息。使用 rpm 的 --nodeps 选项作为解决此问题的方法。

trans-unit.source: Some Windows commands (for example, dir) are not provided by separate applications, but by the command interpreter itself. If you attempt to use QProcess to execute these commands directly, it won't work. One possible solution is to execute the command interpreter itself (cmd.exe on some Windows systems), and ask the interpreter to execute the desired command.
trans-unit.target: 某些Windows命令（例如 dir ）不是由单独的应用程序提供的，而是由命令解释器本身提供的。如果您尝试使用QProcess直接执行这些命令，它将无法正常工作。一种可能的解决方案是执行命令解释器本身（在某些Windows系统上为 cmd.exe ），并要求解释器执行所需的命令。

trans-unit.source: Some Windows commands (for example, dir) are not provided by separate applications, but by the command interpreter itself. If you attempt to use QProcess to execute these commands directly, it won't work. One possible solution is to execute the command interpreter itself (cmd.exe on some Windows systems), and ask the interpreter to execute the desired command.
Some X11 window managers do not support the "stays on top" flag. A solution is to set up a timer that periodically calls raise() on the splash screen to simulate the "stays on top" effect.
trans-unit.target: 某些X11窗口管理器不支持“停留在顶部”标志。一种解决方案是设置一个计时器，该计时器在启动屏幕上定期调用raise（）以模拟“停留在顶部”的效果。

trans-unit.source: Some algorithms have special requirements on the value type stored in the containers. For example, qDeleteAll() requires that the value type is a non-const pointer type (for example, QWidget *). The value type requirements are specified for each algorithm, and the compiler will produce an error if a requirement isn't met.
trans-unit.target: 一些算法对存储在容器中的值类型有特殊要求。例如，qDeleteAll（）要求值类型是非常量指针类型（例如QWidget *）。为每种算法指定了值类型要求，如果不满足要求，则编译器将产生错误。

trans-unit.source: Some algorithms have special requirements on the value type stored in the containers. For example, qDeleteAll() requires that the value type is a non-const pointer type (for example, QWidget *). The value type requirements are specified for each algorithm, and the compiler will produce an error if a requirement isn't met.

Some applications may need to interface Qt with other frameworks. This often means using graphics contexts or other types of native handles created by one framework with another. For example, on some platforms, QOpenGLContext offers the ability to wrap an existing native OpenGL context, instead of creating a new one. This existing native context can be created by some other third-party code.
trans-unit.target: 某些应用程序可能需要将Qt与其他框架接口。这通常意味着使用一个框架与另一个框架创建的图形上下文或其他类型的本机句柄。例如，在某些平台上，QOpenGLContext提供了包装现有的本机OpenGL上下文的功能，而不是创建一个新的上下文。可以通过其他一些第三方代码创建此现有的本机上下文。

trans-unit.source: Some applications may want to suppress any form of roaming altogether. Possible use cases may be high priority downloads or remote services which cannot handle a roaming enabled client. Clients can suppress roaming by connecting to the preferredConfigurationChanged() signal and answer each signal emission with ignore().
trans-unit.target: 某些应用程序可能希望完全禁止任何形式的漫游。可能的用例可能是无法处理启用了漫游功能的客户端的高优先级下载或远程服务。客户端可以通过连接到preferredConfigurationChanged（）信号来抑制漫游，并使用ignore（）回答每个信号发射。

trans-unit.source: Some applications will want to be functional with multiple accelerated graphics backends. This has consequences for ShaderEffect items because the supported shading languages may vary from backend to backend.
trans-unit.target: 某些应用程序需要具有多个加速图形后端的功能。这会对ShaderEffect项产生影响，因为支持的着色语言可能因后端而异。

trans-unit.source: Some applications will want to be functional with multiple accelerated graphics backends. This has consequences for ShaderEffect items because the supported shading languages may vary from backend to backend.

The following snippet shows how to save and remove a place using javascript.

Some backends only support enabling or disabling the buffer and do not give control over the size. In this case, the maxBufferSize and efficientBufferSize properties might not be set at all, even though buffering is supported. Setting the bufferSize property to any value greater than 1 will enable buffering. After the sensor has been started, the bufferSize property will be set to the actual value by the backend.
trans-unit.target: 某些后端仅支持启用或禁用缓冲区，而不控制大小。在这种情况下，MAXBUFFERSIZE和efficientBufferSize性能可能不会在所有的设置，即使缓冲支持。将bufferSize属性设置为大于1的任何值将启用缓冲。启动传感器之后，后端会将bufferSize属性设置为实际值。

Some cache implementations can keep these cache items in memory for performance reasons, but for security reasons they should not be written to disk.

trans-unit.source: Some calendars, despite having no year 0, have a conventional numbering of the years before their first year, counting backwards from 1. For example, in the proleptic Gregorian calendar, successive years before 1 CE (the first year) are identified as 1 BCE, 2 BCE, 3 BCE and so on. For such calendars, negative year numbers are used to indicate these years before year 1, with -1 indicating the year before 1.

Some calendars, however, represent years before their first by an alternate numbering; for example, the proleptic Gregorian calendar's first year is 1 CE and the year before it is 1 BCE, preceded by 2 BCE and so on. In this case, we use negative year numbers for this alternate numbering, with year -1 as the year before year 1, year -2 as the year before year -1 and so on. Such a calendar is proleptic but has no year zero.
Some camera devices may not have flash hardware, or may not be configurable. In that case, there will be no QCameraFlashControl available.
trans-unit.target: 某些相机设备可能没有闪光灯硬件，或者可能无法配置。在这种情况下，将没有可用的QCameraFlashControl。

trans-unit.source: Some camera devices may not have flash hardware, or may not be configurable. In that case, there will be no QCameraFlashControl available.

Some care must be taken when trying to convert the data in chunks, for example, when receiving it over a network. In such cases it is possible that a multi-byte character will be split over two chunks. At best this might result in the loss of a character and at worst cause the entire conversion to fail.
trans-unit.target: 在试图将数据分块转换时,例如在网络上接收数据时,必须小心谨慎。在这种情况下,一个多字节的字符有可能被分割成两个块。在最好的情况下,这可能会导致一个字符的丢失,在最坏的情况下,会导致整个转换失败。

trans-unit.source: Some care should be taken that no conflicting QScrollEvents are sent from two sources. Using QScroller::scrollTo is save however.
trans-unit.target: 应该注意不要从两个来源发送冲突的QScrollEvent。但是使用QScroller :: scrollTo保存。

trans-unit.source: Some classes have changed modules. In particular, the QBuffer, QAttribute and QGeometry classes (along with associated helper classes) have moved from the Render module to the Core module.

trans-unit.target: 一些类支持多种实际事件类型。QMouseEvent支持鼠标按键按下，双击，移动和其他相关操作。

trans-unit.source: Some configuration updates may require some time to perform updates. A WLAN scan is such an example. Unless the platform performs internal updates it may be required to manually trigger configuration updates via QNetworkConfigurationManager::updateConfigurations(). The completion of the update process is indicated by emitting the updateCompleted() signal. The update process ensures that every existing QNetworkConfiguration instance is updated. There is no need to ask for a renewed configuration list via allConfigurations().
trans-unit.target: 某些配置更新可能需要一些时间才能执行更新。 WLAN扫描就是这样的示例。除非平台执行内部更新，否则可能需要通过QNetworkConfigurationManager :: updateConfigurations（）手动触发配置更新。通过发出updateCompleted（）信号来指示更新过程的完成。更新过程可确保更新每个现有的QNetworkConfiguration实例。无需通过allConfigurations（）请求更新的配置列表。

trans-unit.source: Some configuration variables accept a list of strings as their value, for example: sourcedirs, while others accept only a single string. trans-unit.target: 一些配置变量接受字符串列表作为其值，例如： sourcedirs ，而其他一些仅接受单个字符串。值字符串周围的双引号是可选的，但包括在内的双引号允许您在值字符串中使用特殊字符，例如'='和'“'，例如：

trans-unit.source: Some configuration variables allow you to use QDoc to support Qt-based projects. They allow your project to contain links to the online Qt documentation, which means that QDoc will be able to create links to the class reference documentation, without any explicit linking command.
trans-unit.target: 一些配置变量允许你使用QDoc来支持基于Qt的项目,它们允许你的项目包含到在线Qt文档的链接,这意味着QDoc将能够创建到类参考文档的链接,而无需任何明确的链接命令。它们允许你的项目包含到在线Qt文档的链接,这意味着QDoc将能够创建到类参考文档的链接,而不需要任何明确的链接命令。

trans-unit.source: Some constants are defined only on certain platforms. You can use the preprocessor symbols Q_OS_WIN and Q_OS_MACOS to test that the application is compiled under Windows or macOS.
trans-unit.target: 一些常量仅在某些平台上定义。您可以使用预处理器符号Q_OS_WIN和Q_OS_MACOS来测试应用程序是否在Windows或macOS下编译。

trans-unit.source: Some constants are defined only on certain platforms. You can use the preprocessor symbols Q_OS_WIN and Q_OS_MACOS to test that the application is compiled under Windows or macOS.

Some containers have additional requirements for the data types they can store. For example, the Key type of a QMap<Key, T> must provide operator<(). Such special requirements are documented in a class's detailed description. In some cases, specific functions have special requirements; these are described on a per-function basis. The compiler will always emit an error if a requirement isn't met.
trans-unit.target: 一些容器对它们可以存储的数据类型有其他要求。例如，QMap <Key，T> 的Key类型必须提供 operator<() 。这些特殊要求记录在班级的详细说明中。在某些情况下，特定功能有特殊要求；这些是按功能描述的。如果不满足要求，编译器将始终发出错误。

trans-unit.source: Some corner cases involving namespaces and element constructors are incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 一些涉及命名空间和元素构造函数的角案例不正确。

trans-unit.source: Some custom widgets have special user interface features that may make them behave differently to many of the standard widgets found in
trans-unit.target: 一些自定义小部件具有特殊的用户界面功能,可能会使它们的行为与许多标准小部件不同。

trans-unit.source: Some data, which is returned by data(), internalPointer(), and additionalData().
trans-unit.target: 一些数据，由data（），internalPointer（）和AdditionalData（）返回。

trans-unit.source: Some databases are capable of returning multiple result sets for stored procedures or SQL batches (a query strings that contains multiple statements). If multiple result sets are available after executing a query this function can be used to navigate to the next result set(s).
trans-unit.target: 一些数据库能够为存储过程或SQL批次(包含多条语句的查询字符串)返回多个结果集。如果执行一个查询后有多个结果集,这个函数可以用来导航到下一个结果集。

trans-unit.source: Some devices may provide multiple manufacturer data entries per manufacturer ID. An example might be a Bluetooth Low Energy device that sends a different manufacturer data via advertisement packets and scan response packets respectively. Therefore the returned hash table may have multiple entries per manufacturer ID or hash key.
Some driver managers and drivers do not support UNICODE. To use the QODBC plugin with such drivers, it has to be compiled with Q_ODBC_VERSION_2 defined.
trans-unit.target: 有些驱动程序管理器和驱动程序不支持UNICODE。如果要使用QODBC插件与这样的驱动一起使用,必须在编译时定义Q_ODBC_VERSION_2。

trans-unit.source: Some drivers do not support scrollable cursors. In that case, only queries in forwardOnly mode can be used successfully.
trans-unit.target: 有些驱动程序不支持可滚动光标。在这种情况下,只有在forwardOnly模式下的查询才能成功使用。

trans-unit.source: Some effects will want to provide a vertex shader as well. Below is a similar effect with both the vertex and fragment shader provided by the application. This time the colorization factor is provided by the QML item instead of hardcoding it in the shader. This can allow, among others, animating the value using QML's and Qt Quick's standard facilities.
trans-unit.target: 有些效果会希望也提供一个顶点着色器。下面是一个类似的效果,应用程序同时提供了顶点和片段着色器。这次的着色因子是由QML项提供的,而不是在着色器中硬编码。这可以允许,使用QML的和Qt Quick的标准设施对该值进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: Some events, such as QEvent::ShortcutOverride must be explicitly accepted (by calling accept() on them) in order to prevent propagation.
trans-unit.target: 为了防止传播，必须显式接受某些事件，例如QEvent :: ShortcutOverride（通过在它们上调用accept（））。

trans-unit.source: Some events, such as QMouseEvent and QKeyEvent, come from the window system; some, such as QTimerEvent, come from other sources; some come from the application itself.
trans-unit.target: 一些事件，例如QMouseEvent和QKeyEvent，来自窗口系统。一些，例如QTimerEvent，来自其他来源；有些来自应用程序本身。

trans-unit.source: Some examples
Some examples:
trans-unit.target: 一些例子:

trans-unit.source: Some features of QNetworkDatagram are not supported in all operating systems. Only the address and ports of the remote host (sender in received packets and destination for outgoing packets) are supported in all systems. On most operating systems, the other features are supported only for IPv6. Software should check at runtime whether the rest could be determined for IPv4 addresses.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有操作系统都支持QNetworkDatagram的某些功能。在所有系统中，仅支持远程主机的地址和端口（接收的数据包中的发送方和传出数据包的目的地）。在大多数操作系统上，仅IPv6支持其他功能。软件应在运行时检查是否可以确定其余的IPv4地址。

trans-unit.source: Some features of QNetworkDatagram are not supported in all operating systems. Only the address and ports of the remote host (sender in received packets and destination for outgoing packets) are supported in all systems. On most operating systems, the other features are supported only for IPv6. Software should check at runtime whether the rest could be determined for IPv4 addresses.
Some features of the parser can be enabled or disabled via the

Some filesystem types allow multiple subvolumes inside one device, which may be mounted in different paths. If the subvolume could be detected, it is returned here. The format of the subvolume name is specific to each filesystem type.
trans-unit.target: 有些文件系统类型允许在一个设备内有多个子卷,这些子卷可能被挂载在不同的路径上。如果可以检测到该子卷,则在此返回。子卷名称的格式是每个文件系统类型所特有的。

trans-unit.source: Some hardware supports a movable focus lens assembly, and typically this hardware also supports automatically focusing via some heuristic. You can influence this via the FocusPointMode setting - typically the center of the frame is brought into focus, but some hardware also supports focusing on any faces detected in the frame, or on a specific point (usually provided by a user in a "touch to focus" scenario).
trans-unit.target: 一些硬件支持可移动聚焦透镜组件，通常，该硬件还支持通过启发式自动聚焦。您可以通过FocusPointMode设置来影响此效果 -通常将框架的中心置于焦点上，但是某些硬件还支持聚焦在框架中检测到的任何面部或特定点上（通常由用户通过“触摸焦点”方案）。

trans-unit.source: Some image formats are able to conserve CPU time by rendering only the specified region. Others will need to load the entire image first and then clip it to the specified region.

Some image formats, in particular lossy ones, entail a tradeoff between a) visual quality of the resulting image, and b) decoding execution time. This function sets the level of that tradeoff for image formats that support it.
trans-unit.target: 一些图像格式,特别是有损图像,需要在a)生成图像的视觉质量和b)解码执行时间之间进行权衡。这个函数为支持这种格式的图像设置了这种权衡的水平。

trans-unit.source: Some image formats, in particular lossy ones, entail a tradeoff between a) visual quality of the resulting image, and b) encoding execution time and compression level. This function sets the level of that tradeoff for image formats that support it. For other formats, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 一些图像格式,特别是有损图像,需要在以下两方面进行权衡:a)生成图像的视觉质量,b)编码执行时间和压缩程度。这个函数为支持这种格式的图像设置了这种权衡的水平,对于其他格式,这个值被忽略。对于其他格式,该值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Some implementations will share the same OpenGL context between multiple QQuickWindow instances. The openglContextCreated() signal will in this case only be emitted for the first window, when the OpenGL context is actually created.
trans-unit.target: 一些实现将在多个QQuickWindow实例之间共享相同的OpenGL上下文。在这种情况下，当实际创建OpenGL上下文时，只会为第一个窗口发出openglContextCreated（）信号。

Some information may not make sense in other applications such as IVI systems.

Some keyboard layouts, such as symbol layouts, may contain more keys than it is feasible to present on a single keyboard layout. A solution is to embed multiple keyboard layouts into the same context by using the KeyboardLayoutLoader.
trans-unit.target: 某些键盘布局（例如符号布局）可能包含的按键数量可能超出在单个键盘布局上显示的数量。一种解决方案是使用KeyboardLayoutLoader将多个键盘布局嵌入到同一上下文中。

trans-unit.target: 有些键也可以通过特定的信号属性来处理,如

trans-unit.source: Some map items such as MapPolyline, MapPolygon and MapRectangle will be rendered after the topmost layer of the style. With this parameter set, the map items will be rendered before the layer ID specified, unless the layer is not present on the current style, which will fallback to the default behavior. This parameter can be used to display route lines under labels.
trans-unit.target: 有些地图项目，如MapPolyline，MapPolygon和MapRectangle将最上面后呈现层的风格。设置此参数后，地图项将在指定的图层ID 之前渲染，除非该图层不在当前样式上，否则将回退到默认行为。此参数可用于在标签下显示路线。

trans-unit.source: Some material flags prevent batching, the most limiting one being QSGMaterial::RequiresFullMatrix which prevents all batching.
trans-unit.target: 一些材料标志阻止了批处理，其中最受限制的一个是QSGMaterial :: RequiresFullMatrix，它阻止了所有批处理。

trans-unit.source: Some mobile platforms use the concept of grouped access points (also called SNAP or Service Network Access Point). In principle multiple configurations are grouped together and possibly even prioritized when compared to each other. This is useful for use cases where all configurations serve a similar purpose or context. A common context could be that they provide access to the public Internet or possibly only to the office Intranet. By providing a pool of configurations the system can make a decision based on given priorities which usually map to factors such as speed, availability and cost. Furthermore the system can automatically roam from one access point to the next one while ensuring minimal impact on the user experience.
trans-unit.target: 一些移动平台使用分组接入点(也称为SNAP或服务网接入点)的概念。原则上,多个配置被归为一组,甚至可能在相互比较时被优先考虑。这对于所有配置都有类似目的或背景的用例是有用的。一个常见的背景可能是它们提供对公共互联网的访问,或者可能只提供对办公室内联网的访问。通过提供一个配置池,系统可以根据给定的优先级做出决定,这些优先级通常映射到速度、可用性和成本等因素。此外,系统可以自动从一个接入点漫游到下一个接入点,同时确保对用户体验的影响最小。

trans-unit.source: Some models need to obtain data from remote sources, or must perform time-consuming operations to obtain information about the way the data is organized. Since views generally request as much information as possible in order to accurately display model data, it can be useful to restrict the amount of information returned to them to reduce unnecessary follow-up requests for data.
trans-unit.target: 有些模型需要从远程来源获取数据,或者必须执行耗时的操作来获取数据组织方式的信息。由于视图为了准确地显示模型数据,一般会请求尽可能多的信息,因此限制返回给它们的信息量,以减少不必要的后续数据请求,是很有用的。

For example, you can create decorated windows by passing the Qt::Window window flag to QGraphicsWidget's constructor, but Graphics View currently doesn't support the Qt::Sheet and Qt::Drawer flags that are common on macOS.

Some of QWidget's properties are supported, including window flags and attributes, but not all. You should refer to QGraphicsWidget's class documentation for a complete overview of what is and what is not supported. For example, you can create decorated windows by passing the Qt::Window window flag to QGraphicsWidget's constructor, but Graphics View currently doesn't support the Qt::Sheet and Qt::Drawer flags that are common on macOS.

Some of QFileInfo's functions query the file system, but for performance reasons, some functions only operate on the file name itself. For example: To return the absolute path of a relative file name, absolutePath() has to query the file system. The path() function, however, can work on the file name directly, and so it is faster.
Some of the Qt modules might have features that are not supported on Android or have limitations. For more information, see QTBUG-72086.

Some of the added features listed above for the Qt Object Model, require that we think of Qt Objects as identities, not values. Values are copied or assigned; identities are cloned. Cloning means to create a new identity, not an exact copy of the old one. For example, twins have different identities. They may look identical, but they have different names, different locations, and may have completely different social networks.
trans-unit.target: 上面列举的一些Qt对象模型的附加功能,要求我们把Qt对象看作是身份,而不是值。值是复制或分配的,而身份是克隆的。克隆的意思是创建一个新的身份,而不是旧身份的完全拷贝。例如,双胞胎有不同的身份。他们可能看起来一模一样,但他们有不同的名字,不同的地点,可能有完全不同的社交网络。

trans-unit.source: Some of the bounding rectangles that we outline in the widget images are equal. Reasons for this are that some elements draw backgrounds while others draw frames and labels. If in doubt, check the description of each element in QStyle. Also, some elements are there to layout, i.e., decide where to draw, other elements.
trans-unit.target: 我们在小部件图像中概述的某些边界矩形是相等的。原因是某些元素绘制背景，而另一些元素绘制框架和标签。如有疑问，请检查QStyle中每个元素的描述。另外，有些元素可以在那里布局，即决定在哪里绘制其他元素。

trans-unit.source: Some of the buttons are checked.
trans-unit.target: 部分按钮被选中。

trans-unit.source: Some of the clocks used by QElapsedTimer have a limited range and may overflow after hitting the upper limit (usually 32-bit). QElapsedTimer deals with this overflow issue and presents a consistent timing. However, when extracting the time since reference from QElapsedTimer, two different processes in the same machine may have different understanding of how much time has actually elapsed.
trans-unit.target: QElapsedTimer使用的某些时钟范围有限，并且在达到上限（通常为32位）后可能会溢出。QElapsedTimer处理此溢出问题并提出一致的计时。但是，当从QElapsedTimer提取自引用以来的时间时，同一台计算机中的两个不同进程可能对实际经过了多少时间有不同的理解。

trans-unit.source: Some of the clocks used by QElapsedTimer have a limited range and may overflow after hitting the upper limit (usually 32-bit). QElapsedTimer deals with this overflow issue and presents a consistent timing. However, when extracting the time since reference from QElapsedTimer, two different processes in the same machine may have different understanding of how much time has actually elapsed.

Some of the operating systems and windowing systems that Qt runs on only have limited support for Unicode. The level of support available in the underlying system has some influence on the support that Qt can provide on those platforms, although in general Qt applications need not be too concerned with platform-specific limitations.
trans-unit.target: Qt运行的一些操作系统和窗口系统对Unicode的支持有限。底层系统的支持程度对Qt在这些平台上所能提供的支持有一定的影响,不过一般来说,Qt应用程序不需要太在意平台的特定限制。

trans-unit.source: Some of the values in this enum represent a user configuration. Such enum values will return the same paths in different applications, so they could be used to share data with other applications. Other values are specific to this application. Each enum value in the table below describes whether it's application-specific or generic.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举中的一些值代表了用户配置。这样的枚举值在不同的应用程序中会返回相同的路径,所以它们可以用来与其他应用程序共享数据。其他的值则是这个应用程序所特有的。下表中的每个枚举值都描述了它是特定于应用程序还是通用的。

trans-unit.source: Some of these packages depend on others in this list, so installing one may cause others to be automatically installed. Other distributions may provide system packages with similar names.
trans-unit.target: 这些软件包中的一些依赖于此列表中的其他软件包,因此安装一个软件包可能会导致其他软件包自动安装。其他发行版可能会提供名称相似的系统包。

trans-unit.source: Some older Unix distributions contain only partial support for some locales. For example, if you have a /usr/share/locale/ja_JP.EUC directory, this does not necessarily mean you can display Japanese text; you also need to have Japanese fonts installed, and the /usr/share/locale/ja_JP.EUC directory needs to be complete. For best results, use complete locales from your system vendor.
trans-unit.target: 一些较旧的Unix发行版仅对某些语言环境提供部分支持。例如，如果您有一个 /usr/share/locale/ja_JP.EUC 目录，这并不一定意味着您可以显示日语文本。您还需要安装日语字体，并且 /usr/share/locale/ja_JP.EUC 目录需要完整。为了获得最佳结果，请使用系统供应商提供的完整语言环境。

trans-unit.source: Some operating systems limit the number of timers that may be used; Qt tries to work around these limitations.
trans-unit.target: 一些操作系统限制了可以使用的定时器的数量;Qt试图绕过这些限制。

trans-unit.source: Some operations such as translate(), scale(), and rotate() can be performed more efficiently if the matrix being modified is already known to be the identity, a previous translate(), a previous scale(), etc.
trans-unit.target: 如果已知要修改的矩阵是恒等式，先前的translate（），先前的scale（）等，则可以更有效地执行诸如translate（），scale（）和rotate（）之类的某些操作。

trans-unit.source: Some paths returned by QStandardPaths::writableLocation() may be empty.
trans-unit.target: QStandardPaths :: writableLocation（）返回的某些路径可能为空。

trans-unit.source: Some pixel metrics are called from widgets and some are only called internally by the style. If the metric is not called by a widget, it is the discretion of the style author to make use of it. For some styles, this may not be appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 有些像素指标是由小组件调用的,有些则是由样式内部调用的。如果度量没有被小组件调用,则由样式作者决定是否使用它。对于某些样式来说,这可能是不合适的。

trans-unit.source: Some platforms can group audio streams into categories and manage their volumes independently, or display them in a system mixer control. You can set this property to allow the platform to distinguish the purpose of your streams.
trans-unit.target: 一些平台可以将音频流归类,并独立管理它们的音量,或者在系统混音器控制中显示它们。你可以设置这个属性,让平台区分你的流的目的。

trans-unit.source: Some platforms can perform different audio routing for different categories, or may allow the user to set different volume levels for different categories.
trans-unit.target: 有些平台可以针对不同类别进行不同的音频路由,也可以允许用户为不同类别设置不同的音量。

trans-unit.source: Some platforms have a policy of suspending sensors when the screen turns off. Setting this property to true will ensure the sensor continues to run.
trans-unit.target: 一些平台的政策是在屏幕关闭时暂停传感器。将此属性设置为true将确保传感器继续运行。

trans-unit.source: Some platforms like Android and WinRT cannot handle multiple native windows properly, so only the Qt Quick 2 graphs are available in practice for those platforms.
trans-unit.target: 某些平台（例如Android和WinRT）无法正确处理多个本机窗口，因此实际上只有Qt Quick 2图形可用于这些平台。

trans-unit.source: Some platforms like Android and WinRT cannot handle multiple native windows properly, so only the Qt Quick 2 graphs are available in practice for those platforms.

Some platforms may distinguish forced roaming and application level roaming (ALR). ALR implies that the application controls (via migrate(), ignore(), accept() and reject()) whether a network session can roam from one access point to the next. Such control is useful if the application maintains stateful socket connections and wants to control the transition from one interface to the next. Forced roaming implies that the system automatically roams to the next network without consulting the application. This has the advantage that the application can make use of roaming features without actually being aware of it. It is expected that the application detects that the underlying socket is broken and automatically reconnects via the new network link.
trans-unit.target: 某些平台可能会区分强制漫游和应用程序级别漫游（ALR）。ALR意味着应用程序可以控制（通过迁移（），忽略（），接受（）和拒绝）（））网络会话是否可以从一个访问点漫游到另一个访问点。如果应用程序维护有状态的套接字连接并希望控制从一个接口到下一个接口的过渡，则这种控制很有用。强制漫游意味着系统自动漫游到下一个网络，而无需咨询应用程序。这样做的好处是，应用程序可以使用漫游功能，而实际上并不知道它。预计应用程序会检测到底层套接字已损坏，并通过新的网络链接自动重新连接。

trans-unit.source: Some platforms may support the concept of Forced Roaming and Application Level Roaming (ALR). Forced roaming implies that the platform may simply roam to a new configuration without consulting applications. It is up to the application to detect the link layer loss and reestablish its sockets. In contrast ALR provides the opportunity to prevent the system from roaming. If this session is based on a configuration that supports roaming the application can choose whether it wants to be consulted (ALR use case) by connecting to this signal. For as long as this signal connection remains the session remains registered as a roaming stakeholder; otherwise roaming will be enforced by the platform.
trans-unit.target: 一些平台可能支持强制漫游和应用级漫游(ALR)的概念。强制漫游意味着平台可以简单地漫游到一个新的配置,而无需咨询应用程序。它由应用程序来检测链路层损失并重新建立其套接字。相反,ALR提供了防止系统漫游的机会。如果这个会话是基于支持漫游的配置,应用程序可以通过连接到这个信号来选择是否要被咨询(ALR用例)。只要这个信号连接还在,该会话就仍然注册为漫游利益相关者;否则漫游将被平台强制执行。

trans-unit.source: Some platforms provide the option of compiling shader source code to an intermediate format similar to SPIR-V. This involves running platform-specific tools. With Direct 3D, the qsb tool provides the option to invoke the fxc tool from the Windows SDK once the HLSL source code has been generated. It then replaces the HLSL source code with the DXBC binary generated by fxc. This can have a positive effect on applications' run time performance since they no longer need to do the first phase of compilation (HLSL source to DXBC) themselves. For macOS and iOS the XCode SDK provides similar tools. The downside of this approach that running these tools is only possible on their respective platforms. Therefore, this is best suited for use in combination with qsb's CMake integration since doing shader conditioning at application build time implicitly comes with the knowledge needed about the target platform and what platform-specific tools can be invoked.
Some plugin classes require additional functions to be implemented. See the class documentation for details of the virtual functions that must be reimplemented for each type of plugin.
trans-unit.target: 有些插件类需要实现额外的功能。请参阅类文档,了解每种类型的插件必须重新实现的虚拟函数的细节。

So, for example, even though properties of the color type store colors and not strings, you are able to assign the string "red" to a color property, without an error being reported.

trans-unit.source: Some regexps can match an indeterminate number of times. For example if the input string is "Offsets: 12 14 99 231 7" and the regexp, rx, is (\d+)+, we would hope to get a list of all the numbers matched. However, after calling rx.indexIn(str), capturedTexts() will return the list ("12", "12"), i.e. the entire match was "12" and the first subexpression matched was "12". The correct approach is to use cap() in a loop.
trans-unit.target: 一些正则表达式可以匹配不确定的次数。例如，如果输入字符串为“ Offsets：12 14 99 231 7”，而正则表达式 rx 为（\ d +）+，我们希望得到所有匹配数字的列表。但是，在调用 rx.indexIn(str) 之后，capturedTexts（）将返回列表（“ 12”，“ 12”），即整个匹配为“ 12”，而匹配的第一个子表达式为“ 12”。正确的方法是在循环中使用cap（）。

trans-unit.source: Some roles have special semantics. In order to implement check boxes for example a "checked" property is expected.
trans-unit.target: 一些角色有特殊的语义。例如,为了实现复选框,需要一个 "checked "属性。

trans-unit.source: Some scene graph backends use texture atlasses, grouping multiple small textures into one large texture. If this is the case, the function isAtlasTexture() will return true. Atlases are used to aid the rendering algorithm to do better sorting which increases performance. Atlases are also essential for batching (merging together geometry to reduce the number of draw calls), because two instances of the same material using two different QSGTextures are not batchable, whereas if both QSGTextures refer to the same atlas, batching can happen, assuming the materials are otherwise compatible.

Some scene graph backends use texture atlasses, grouping multiple small textures into one large texture. If this is the case, the function isAtlasTexture() will return true. Atlasses are used to aid the rendering algorithm to do better sorting which increases performance. The location of the texture inside the atlas is given with the normalizedTextureSubRect() function.
trans-unit.target: 一些场景图后端使用纹理地图集，将多个小纹理分组为一个大纹理。在这种情况下，函数isAtlasTexture（）将返回true。地图集用于帮助渲染算法进行更好的排序，从而提高性能。地图集内纹理的位置由normalizedTextureSubRect（）函数给出。

trans-unit.source: Some scenegraph backends, software in particular, use no scissor or stencil. There the clip region is provided as an ordinary QRegion.

Some sensors (eg. the accelerometer) are often accessed very frequently. This may be slowed down by the use of signals and slots. The QSensorFilter interface provides a more efficient way for the sensor to notify your class that the sensor has changed.
trans-unit.target: 一些传感器（例如，加速度计）经常被非常频繁地访问。使用信号和时隙可能会减慢速度。该QSensorFilter接口为传感器通知你的类，该传感器具有改变更有效的方式。

trans-unit.source: Some sensors (eg. the accelerometer) are often accessed very frequently. This may be slowed down by the use of signals and slots. The QSensorFilter interface provides a more efficient way for the sensor to notify your class that the sensor has changed.
Some sensors may be on the system but unavailable for use. This function will return true if the sensor is busy. You will not be able to start() the sensor.
trans-unit.target: 某些传感器可能在系统上，但无法使用。如果传感器忙，则此函数将返回true。您将无法启动（）传感器。

trans-unit.source: Some sensors react to screen orientation changes, such as QAccelerometer, QMagnetometer and QRotationSensor. These are so called
trans-unit.target: 一些传感器会对屏幕方向变化做出反应，例如QAccelerometer，QMagnetometer和QRotationSensor。这些就是所谓的

trans-unit.source: Some sequential devices support communicating via multiple channels. These channels represent separate streams of data that have the property of independently sequenced delivery. Once the device is opened, you can determine the number of channels by calling the readChannelCount() and writeChannelCount() functions. To switch between channels, call setCurrentReadChannel() and setCurrentWriteChannel(), respectively. QIODevice also provides additional signals to handle asynchronous communication on a per-channel basis.
trans-unit.target: 一些顺序设备支持通过多个通道进行通信。这些通道代表具有独立顺序传送属性的单独数据流。打开设备后，可以通过调用readChannelCount（）和writeChannelCount（）函数来确定通道数。要在通道之间切换，请分别调用setCurrentReadChannel（）和setCurrentWriteChannel（）。QIODevice还提供其他信号，以逐个通道处理异步通信。

trans-unit.source: Some sequential devices support communicating via multiple channels. These channels represent separate streams of data that have the property of independently sequenced delivery. Once the device is opened, you can determine the number of channels by calling the readChannelCount() and writeChannelCount() functions. To switch between channels, call setCurrentReadChannel() and setCurrentWriteChannel(), respectively. QIODevice also provides additional signals to handle asynchronous communication on a per-channel basis.

Some shading languages and APIs have a concept of separate image and sampler objects. Qt Quick always works with combined image sampler objects in shaders, as supported by SPIR-V. Therefore shaders supplied for ShaderEffect should always use layout(binding = 1) uniform sampler2D tex; style sampler declarations. The underlying abstraction layer and the shader pipeline takes care of making this work for all the supported APIs and shading languages, transparently to the applications.

Some states and variables are common for all widgets. These are set with QStyleOption::initFrom(). Not all elements use this function; it is the widgets that create the style options, and for some elements the information from initFrom() is not necessary.
trans-unit.target: 一些状态和变量对于所有小部件都是通用的。这些是通过QStyleOption :: initFrom（）设置的。并非所有元素都使用此功能。是由小部件创建样式选项，对于某些元素，不需要initFrom（）中的信息。

trans-unit.source: Some subclasses, such as QFile and QTcpSocket, are implemented using a memory buffer for intermediate storing of data. This reduces the number of required device accessing calls, which are often very slow. Buffering makes functions like getChar() and putChar() fast, as they can operate on the memory buffer instead of directly on the device itself. Certain I/O operations, however, don't work well with a buffer. For example, if several users open the same device and read it character by character, they may end up reading the same data when they meant to read a separate chunk each. For this reason, QIODevice allows you to bypass any buffering by passing the Unbuffered flag to open(). When subclassing QIODevice, remember to bypass any buffer you may use when the device is open in Unbuffered mode.
trans-unit.target: 一些子类（例如QFile和QTcpSocket）是使用内存缓冲区实现中间数据存储的。这减少了所需设备访问呼叫的数量，这些访问通常很慢。缓冲使诸如getChar（）和putChar（）之类的函数快速运行，因为它们可以在内存缓冲区上运行，而不是直接在设备本身上运行。但是，某些I / O操作不能与缓冲区配合使用。例如，如果多个用户打开同一设备并逐字符读取设备，那么当他们打算分别读取一个单独的数据块时，他们可能最终会读取相同的数据。因此，QIODevice允许您通过传递Unbuffered标志打开来绕过任何缓冲（）。子类化QIODevice时，请记住绕过在以非缓冲模式打开设备时可能使用的任何缓冲。

trans-unit.source: Some subclasses, such as QFile and QTcpSocket, are implemented using a memory buffer for intermediate storing of data. This reduces the number of required device accessing calls, which are often very slow. Buffering makes functions like getChar() and putChar() fast, as they can operate on the memory buffer instead of directly on the device itself. Certain I/O operations, however, don't work well with a buffer. For example, if several users open the same device and read it character by character, they may end up reading the same data when they meant to read a separate chunk each. For this reason, QIODevice allows you to bypass any buffering by passing the Unbuffered flag to open(). When subclassing QIODevice, remember to bypass any buffer you may use when the device is open in Unbuffered mode.

Some syntaxes can have constructs that span several text blocks. For example, a C++ syntax highlighter should be able to cope with /*...*/ multiline comments. To deal with these cases it is necessary to know the end state of the previous text block (e.g. "in comment").
trans-unit.target: 某些语法可以具有跨越多个文本块的构造。例如，C ++语法突出显示器应该能够处理 / *...* / 多行注释。为了处理这些情况，有必要知道前一个文本块的结束状态（例如“在注释中”）。

trans-unit.source: Some systems may send an event of type QEvent::TouchCancel. Upon receiving this event applications are requested to ignore the entire active touch sequence. For example in a composited system the compositor may decide to treat certain gestures as system-wide gestures. Whenever such a decision is made (the gesture is recognized), the clients will be notified with a QEvent::TouchCancel event so they can update their state accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 某些系统可能会发送QEvent :: TouchCancel类型的事件。收到此事件后，要求应用程序忽略整个活动的触摸顺序。例如，在复合系统中，合成器可以决定将某些手势视为系统范围的手势。只要做出这样的决定（识别手势），客户端就会收到QEvent :: TouchCancel事件通知，以便他们可以相应地更新其状态。

trans-unit.source: Some test strategies are vulnerable to timing-dependent behavior of certain classes, which can lead to tests that fail only on certain platforms or that do not return consistent results.
Some tests use the test machine's display, mouse, and keyboard, and can thus fail if the machine is being used for something else at the same time or if multiple tests are run in parallel.
Some tools use this value even when the setCurrentValue does not perform any action. Progress bars for example are read-only but should return their range divided by 100.
trans-unit.target: 即使setCurrentValue不执行任何操作，某些工具也会使用此值。例如，进度条是只读的，但应返回其范围除以100。

trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标离开小部件，即使鼠标被抓住，某些底层窗口实现也会重置游标。如果要为所有窗口小部件设置光标，即使在窗口外，也可以考虑QGuiApplication :: setOverrideCursor（）。

trans-unit.source: Some underlying window implementations will reset the cursor if it leaves a window even if the mouse is grabbed. If you want to have a cursor set for all windows, even when outside the window, consider QGuiApplication::setOverrideCursor().

trans-unit.source: Some value types in Qt such as QPoint are represented in JavaScript as objects that have the same properties and functions like in the C++ API. The same representation is possible with custom C++ value types. To enable a custom value type with the QML engine, the class declaration needs to be annotated with Q_GADGET. Properties that are intended to be visible in the JavaScript representation need to be declared with Q_PROPERTY. Similarly functions need to be marked with Q_INVOKABLE. This is the same with QObject based C++ APIs. For example, the Actor class below is annotated as gadget and has properties:
trans-unit.target: Qt中的某些值类型（例如QPoint）在JavaScript中表示为具有与C ++ API中相同的属性和功能的对象。自定义C ++值类型可以使用相同的表示形式。要使用QML引擎启用自定义值类型，需要使用 Q_GADGET 注释类声明。需要在JavaScript表示中可见的属性必须使用 Q_PROPERTY 声明。类似地，需要使用 Q_INVOKABLE 标记功能。这与基于QObject的C ++ API相同。例如，下面的 Actor 类被注释为小工具并具有属性：

trans-unit.source: Some views, such as QTableView and QTreeView, display headers as well as items. These are also implemented by a view class, QHeaderView. Headers usually access the same model as the view that contains them. They retrieve data from the model using the QAbstractItemModel::headerData() function, and usually display header information in the form of a label. New headers can be subclassed from the QHeaderView class to provide more specialized labels for views.
trans-unit.target: 一些视图，例如QTableView和QTreeView，显示标题和项目。这些也由视图类QHeaderView实现。标头通常与包含它们的视图访问同一模型。他们使用QAbstractItemModel :: headerData（）函数从模型中检索数据，并且通常以标签形式显示标头信息。可以从QHeaderView类继承新的标头，以为视图提供更专业的标签。

trans-unit.source: Some widgets display themselves differently when they are disabled. For example a button might draw its label grayed out. If your widget needs to know when it becomes enabled or disabled, you can use the changeEvent() with type QEvent::EnabledChange.

trans-unit.source: Some wizards are more complex in that they allow different traversal paths based on the information provided by the user. The License Wizard example illustrates this. It provides five wizard pages; depending on which options are selected, the user can reach different pages.
trans-unit.target: 某些向导更为复杂，因为它们根据用户提供的信息允许不同的遍历路径。所述许可证向导实施例说明这一点。它提供了五个向导页面。根据选择的选项，用户可以访问不同的页面。

Some wrappers call Vulkan functions directly, assuming vulkan.h provides prototypes and the application links to a Vulkan library exporting all necessary symbols. Qt may not directly link to a Vulkan library. Therefore, on some platforms it may be necessary to add LIBS += -lvulkan or similar in the application's .pro file.
trans-unit.target: 某些包装程序直接调用Vulkan函数，假设 vulkan.h 提供了原型，并且应用程序链接到Vulkan库，并导出了所有必需的符号。Qt可能不会直接链接到Vulkan库。因此，在某些平台上，可能有必要在应用程序的 .pro 文件中添加 LIBS += -lvulkan 或类似名称。

trans-unit.source: Some wrappers require exception support to be enabled. Qt does not use exceptions. To enable exceptions for the application, add CONFIG += exceptions to the .pro file.
trans-unit.target: 一些包装器要求启用异常支持。Qt不使用异常。要为应用程序启用例外，请将 CONFIG += exceptions 添加到 .pro 文件。

trans-unit.source: Something else happened and it was bad.
trans-unit.target: 还发生了一些事情,很糟糕。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a QObject-derived class may need to be registered with the QML type system but not as an instantiable type. For example, this is the case if a C++ class:
